python
def get_sort_key(name):
    parts = name.split()
    prefixes = ["de", "van", "von"]
    
    if len(parts) > 2 and parts[-2].lower() in prefixes:
        return f"{parts[-2]} {parts[-1]}"
    return parts[-1]

names = ["Wolfgang Mozart", "Ludwig van Beethoven"]

Names with cultural prefixes require specialized handling:

python
def generate_sort_key(full_name):
    parts = full_name.split()
    prefixes = ["de", "van", "von", "la"]
    
    if len(parts) > 2 and parts[-2].lower() in prefixes:
        return f"{parts[-2]} {parts[-1]}"
    return parts[-1]

names = ["Wolfgang Mozart", "Ludwig van Beethoven"]
sorted_result = sorted(names, key=generate_sort_key)
